book_title: Craveable Keto: Your Low-Carb, High-Fat Roadmap to Weight Loss and Wellness (1)

book_title: Craveable Keto: Your Low-Carb, High-Fat Roadmap to Weight Loss and Wellness (1)

book_title: Craveable Keto: Your Low-Carb, High-Fat Roadmap to Weight Loss and Wellness (1)

book_title: Craveable Keto: Your Low-Carb, High-Fat Roadmap to Weight Loss and Wellness (1)

review: There is a wide variety of recipes in this book that are great. My lower rating is for two reasons. 1) Recipes don't talk about organic or whole food which really are a large part of what make these foods healthiest 2) A large amount of the recipes include erythritol in some form. If you do your research well you'll learn this is bad for you and can actually cause negative side effects. This ingredient can naturally occur in certain foods like fermented foods but that's done naturally and is ok. This ingredient if not naturally occurring in food is most often made synthetically by man and as a result is a GMO food. This was a bummer to learn this book includes this ingredient and so often. I get it that it's a no calorie sweetner but there are other more natural healthier options such as Stevia.
